changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: create table to store the id of entities to delete

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: Store the ids of the ghost executions
changeSet.sql: INSERT into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (ENTITY_NAME, ENTITY_ID) SELECT 'execution', e.execution_id FROM EXECUTION e WHERE e.execution_id NOT IN ( SELECT itpe.execution_id FROM ITEM_TEST_PLAN_EXECUTION itpe );

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: Store the ids of the execution steps
changeSet.sql: INSERT into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (ENTITY_NAME, ENTITY_ID) SELECT 'execution_step', es.execution_step_id FROM EXECUTION_STEP es, EXECUTION_EXECUTION_STEPS ees, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd WHERE es.execution_step_id = ees.execution_step_id AND ees.execution_id = etd.entity_id AND etd.entity_name = 'execution' ;

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: Store the ids of the issue lists to delete
changeSet.sql: INSERT into entities_to_delete (entity_name, entity_id) SELECT 'issue_list', il.issue_list_id FROM ISSUE_LIST il , EXECUTION e, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd WHERE il.issue_list_id = e.issue_list_id AND e.execution_id = etd.entity_id AND etd.entity_name = 'execution'

INSERT into entities_to_delete (entity_name, entity_id) SELECT 'issue_list', il.issue_list_id FROM ISSUE_LIST il , EXECUTION_STEP es, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd2 WHERE il.issue_list_id = es.issue_list_id AND es.execution_step_id = etd2.entity_id AND etd2.entity_name = 'execution_step' ;

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: DELETE Issues of execution and execution steps to delete

delete.where: ISSUE_LIST_ID IN ( SELECT entity_id FROM ENTITIES_TO_DELETE WHERE entity_name = 'issue_list' );

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: DELETE Automated execution extender of executions to delete

delete.where: MASTER_EXECUTION_ID in (select entity_id from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where entity_name = 'execution')

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: DELETE automated suites that are not linked to any automated execution extender

delete.where: SUITE_ID not in (select AUTOMATED_EXECUTION_EXTENDER.SUITE_ID from AUTOMATED_EXECUTION_EXTENDER)

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: Delete execution steps of ghost executions

delete.where: EXECUTION_STEP_ID in (select entity_id from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where entity_name = 'execution_step')
EXECUTION_STEP_ID in (select entity_id from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where entity_name = 'execution_step')
EXECUTION_ID in (select entity_id from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where entity_name = 'execution')

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: DELETE issue lists of executions and execution-steps to delete

delete.where: ISSUE_LIST_ID in (select entity_id from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where entity_name ='issue_list')
